There are separate starting locations for each race
Every starting location has hunting grounds around it that have mobs up to level 15
You can navigate these locations by teleporting around them with the help of a gatekeeper
Lady in white-green robes that is marked as a vortex on your town map (ALT+M)
To get back to the town or a nearest safe zone, you have to use a Scroll of Escape

If you want to start with your friends or go straigth to a more populated starting zone,
use a 'Kamael Village Scroll of Escape' to get together in a matter of seconds

Good luck!
